channel.title: Recipes on David Trumbell
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on David Trumbell

item.title: Pasties
item.description: Below is the recipe for a Cornish pasty from Grandma Trumbell that my Mom has been making for years. Because I now live in London and this recipe was created in the US, the recipe is still in the works for all you UK residents. Crust: 1 cup of plain flour 1⁄3 cup of Trex (or 1⁄3 cup of Crisco) 1⁄3 tsp of table salt 1⁄4 cup of ice cold water Mix flour, shortening and salt, then add water gradually until dough holds together.
